40#ifndef _NETINET_SCTP_VAR_H_
41#define _NETINET_SCTP_VAR_H_

43#include <netinet/sctp_uio.h>

47#if !defined(__Userspace__)
48extern struct pr_usrreqs sctp_usrreqs;

50
51#define sctp_feature_on(inp, feature) (inp->sctp_features |= feature)
52#define sctp_feature_off(inp, feature) (inp->sctp_features &= ~feature)
53#define sctp_is_feature_on(inp, feature) ((inp->sctp_features & feature) == feature)
54#define sctp_is_feature_off(inp, feature) ((inp->sctp_features & feature) == 0)
55
56#define sctp_stcb_feature_on(inp, stcb, feature) {\
57 if (stcb) { \
58 stcb->asoc.sctp_features |= feature; \
59 } else if (inp) { \
60 inp->sctp_features |= feature; \
61 } \
62}
63#define sctp_stcb_feature_off(inp, stcb, feature) {\
64 if (stcb) { \
65 stcb->asoc.sctp_features &= ~feature; \
66 } else if (inp) { \
67 inp->sctp_features &= ~feature; \
68 } \
69}
70#define sctp_stcb_is_feature_on(inp, stcb, feature) \
71 (((stcb != NULL) && \
72 ((stcb->asoc.sctp_features & feature) == feature)) || \
73 ((stcb == NULL) && (inp != NULL) && \
74 ((inp->sctp_features & feature) == feature)))
75#define sctp_stcb_is_feature_off(inp, stcb, feature) \
76 (((stcb != NULL) && \
77 ((stcb->asoc.sctp_features & feature) == 0)) || \
78 ((stcb == NULL) && (inp != NULL) && \
79 ((inp->sctp_features & feature) == 0)) || \
80 ((stcb == NULL) && (inp == NULL)))
81
82/* managing mobility_feature in inpcb (by micchie) */
83#define sctp_mobility_feature_on(inp, feature) (inp->sctp_mobility_features |= feature)
84#define sctp_mobility_feature_off(inp, feature) (inp->sctp_mobility_features &= ~feature)
85#define sctp_is_mobility_feature_on(inp, feature) (inp->sctp_mobility_features & feature)
86#define sctp_is_mobility_feature_off(inp, feature) ((inp->sctp_mobility_features & feature) == 0)
87
88#define sctp_maxspace(sb) (max((sb)->sb_hiwat,SCTP_MINIMAL_RWND))
89
90#define sctp_sbspace(asoc, sb) ((long) ((sctp_maxspace(sb) > (asoc)->sb_cc) ? (sctp_maxspace(sb) - (asoc)->sb_cc) : 0))
91
92#define sctp_sbspace_failedmsgs(sb) ((long) ((sctp_maxspace(sb) > (sb)->sb_cc) ? (sctp_maxspace(sb) - (sb)->sb_cc) : 0))
93
94#define sctp_sbspace_sub(a,b) (((a) > (b)) ? ((a) - (b)) : 0)
95
96/*
97 * I tried to cache the readq entries at one point. But the reality
98 * is that it did not add any performance since this meant we had to
99 * lock the STCB on read. And at that point once you have to do an
100 * extra lock, it really does not matter if the lock is in the ZONE
101 * stuff or in our code. Note that this same problem would occur with
102 * an mbuf cache as well so it is not really worth doing, at least
103 * right now :-D
104 */
105#ifdef INVARIANTS
106#define sctp_free_a_readq(_stcb, _readq) { \
107 if ((_readq)->on_strm_q) \
108 panic("On strm q stcb:%p readq:%p", (_stcb), (_readq)); \
109 SCTP_ZONE_FREE(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_readq), (_readq)); \
110 SCTP_DECR_READQ_COUNT(); \
111}
112#else
113#define sctp_free_a_readq(_stcb, _readq) { \
114 SCTP_ZONE_FREE(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_readq), (_readq)); \
115 SCTP_DECR_READQ_COUNT(); \
116}
117#endif
118
119#define sctp_alloc_a_readq(_stcb, _readq) { \
120 (_readq) = SCTP_ZONE_GET(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_readq), struct sctp_queued_to_read); \
121 if ((_readq)) { \
122 SCTP_INCR_READQ_COUNT(); \
123 } \
124}
125
126#define sctp_free_a_strmoq(_stcb, _strmoq, _so_locked) { \
127 if ((_strmoq)->holds_key_ref) { \
128 sctp_auth_key_release(stcb, sp->auth_keyid, _so_locked); \
129 (_strmoq)->holds_key_ref = 0; \
130 } \
131 SCTP_ZONE_FREE(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_strmoq), (_strmoq)); \
132 SCTP_DECR_STRMOQ_COUNT(); \
133}
134
135#define sctp_alloc_a_strmoq(_stcb, _strmoq) { \
136 (_strmoq) = SCTP_ZONE_GET(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_strmoq), struct sctp_stream_queue_pending); \
137 if ((_strmoq)) { \
138 memset(_strmoq, 0, sizeof(struct sctp_stream_queue_pending)); \
139 SCTP_INCR_STRMOQ_COUNT(); \
140 (_strmoq)->holds_key_ref = 0; \
141 } \
142}
143
144#define sctp_free_a_chunk(_stcb, _chk, _so_locked) { \
145 if ((_chk)->holds_key_ref) {\
146 sctp_auth_key_release((_stcb), (_chk)->auth_keyid, _so_locked); \
147 (_chk)->holds_key_ref = 0; \
148 } \
149 if (_stcb) { \
150 SCTP_TCB_LOCK_ASSERT((_stcb)); \
151 if ((_chk)->whoTo) { \
152 sctp_free_remote_addr((_chk)->whoTo); \
153 (_chk)->whoTo = NULL; \
154 } \
155 if (((_stcb)->asoc.free_chunk_cnt > SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_asoc_free_resc_limit)) || \
156 (SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_free_chunks) > SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_system_free_resc_limit))) { \
157 SCTP_ZONE_FREE(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_chunk), (_chk)); \
158 SCTP_DECR_CHK_COUNT(); \
159 } else { \
160 TAILQ_INSERT_TAIL(&(_stcb)->asoc.free_chunks, (_chk), sctp_next); \
161 (_stcb)->asoc.free_chunk_cnt++; \
162 atomic_add_int(&SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_free_chunks), 1); \
163 } \
164 } else { \
165 SCTP_ZONE_FREE(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_chunk), (_chk)); \
166 SCTP_DECR_CHK_COUNT(); \
167 } \
168}
169
170#define sctp_alloc_a_chunk(_stcb, _chk) { \
171 if (TAILQ_EMPTY(&(_stcb)->asoc.free_chunks)) { \
172 (_chk) = SCTP_ZONE_GET(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_chunk), struct sctp_tmit_chunk); \
173 if ((_chk)) { \
174 SCTP_INCR_CHK_COUNT(); \
175 (_chk)->whoTo = NULL; \
176 (_chk)->holds_key_ref = 0; \
177 } \
178 } else { \
179 (_chk) = TAILQ_FIRST(&(_stcb)->asoc.free_chunks); \
180 TAILQ_REMOVE(&(_stcb)->asoc.free_chunks, (_chk), sctp_next); \
181 atomic_subtract_int(&SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_free_chunks), 1); \
182 (_chk)->holds_key_ref = 0; \
183 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_cached_chk); \
184 (_stcb)->asoc.free_chunk_cnt--; \
185 } \
186}
187
188#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
189#define sctp_free_remote_addr(__net) { \
190 if ((__net)) { \
191 if (SCTP_DECREMENT_AND_CHECK_REFCOUNT(&(__net)->ref_count)) { \
192 RO_NHFREE(&(__net)->ro); \
193 if ((__net)->src_addr_selected) { \
194 sctp_free_ifa((__net)->ro._s_addr); \
195 (__net)->ro._s_addr = NULL; \
196 } \
197 (__net)->src_addr_selected = 0; \
198 (__net)->dest_state &= ~SCTP_ADDR_REACHABLE; \
199 SCTP_ZONE_FREE(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_net), (__net)); \
200 SCTP_DECR_RADDR_COUNT(); \
201 } \
202 } \
203}
204
205#define sctp_sbfree(ctl, stcb, sb, m) { \
206 SCTP_SAVE_ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(sb)->sb_cc, SCTP_BUF_LEN((m))); \
207 SCTP_SAVE_ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(sb)->sb_mbcnt, MSIZE); \
208 if (((ctl)->do_not_ref_stcb == 0) && stcb) {\
209 SCTP_SAVE_ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(stcb)->asoc.sb_cc, SCTP_BUF_LEN((m))); \
210 SCTP_SAVE_ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(stcb)->asoc.my_rwnd_control_len, MSIZE); \
211 } \
212 if (SCTP_BUF_TYPE(m) != MT_DATA && SCTP_BUF_TYPE(m) != MT_HEADER && \
213 SCTP_BUF_TYPE(m) != MT_OOBDATA) \
214 atomic_subtract_int(&(sb)->sb_ctl,SCTP_BUF_LEN((m))); \
215}
216
217#define sctp_sballoc(stcb, sb, m) { \
218 atomic_add_int(&(sb)->sb_cc,SCTP_BUF_LEN((m))); \
219 atomic_add_int(&(sb)->sb_mbcnt, MSIZE); \
220 if (stcb) { \
221 atomic_add_int(&(stcb)->asoc.sb_cc, SCTP_BUF_LEN((m))); \
222 atomic_add_int(&(stcb)->asoc.my_rwnd_control_len, MSIZE); \
223 } \
224 if (SCTP_BUF_TYPE(m) != MT_DATA && SCTP_BUF_TYPE(m) != MT_HEADER && \
225 SCTP_BUF_TYPE(m) != MT_OOBDATA) \
226 atomic_add_int(&(sb)->sb_ctl,SCTP_BUF_LEN((m))); \
227}
228#else /* FreeBSD Version <= 500000 or non-FreeBSD */
229#define sctp_free_remote_addr(__net) { \
230 if ((__net)) { \
231 if (SCTP_DECREMENT_AND_CHECK_REFCOUNT(&(__net)->ref_count)) { \
232 if ((__net)->ro.ro_rt) { \
233 RTFREE((__net)->ro.ro_rt); \
234 (__net)->ro.ro_rt = NULL; \
235 } \
236 if ((__net)->src_addr_selected) { \
237 sctp_free_ifa((__net)->ro._s_addr); \
238 (__net)->ro._s_addr = NULL; \
239 } \
240 (__net)->src_addr_selected = 0; \
241 (__net)->dest_state &=~SCTP_ADDR_REACHABLE; \
242 SCTP_ZONE_FREE(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_net), (__net)); \
243 SCTP_DECR_RADDR_COUNT(); \
244 } \
245 } \
246}
247
248#define sctp_sbfree(ctl, stcb, sb, m) { \
249 SCTP_SAVE_ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(sb)->sb_cc, SCTP_BUF_LEN((m))); \
250 SCTP_SAVE_ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(sb)->sb_mbcnt, MSIZE); \
251 if (((ctl)->do_not_ref_stcb == 0) && stcb) { \
252 SCTP_SAVE_ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(stcb)->asoc.sb_cc, SCTP_BUF_LEN((m))); \
253 SCTP_SAVE_ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(stcb)->asoc.my_rwnd_control_len, MSIZE); \
254 } \
255}
256
257#define sctp_sballoc(stcb, sb, m) { \
258 atomic_add_int(&(sb)->sb_cc, SCTP_BUF_LEN((m))); \
259 atomic_add_int(&(sb)->sb_mbcnt, MSIZE); \
260 if (stcb) { \
261 atomic_add_int(&(stcb)->asoc.sb_cc, SCTP_BUF_LEN((m))); \
262 atomic_add_int(&(stcb)->asoc.my_rwnd_control_len, MSIZE); \
263 } \
264}
265#endif
266
267#define sctp_ucount_incr(val) { \
268 val++; \
269}
270
271#define sctp_ucount_decr(val) { \
272 if (val > 0) { \
273 val--; \
274 } else { \
275 val = 0; \
276 } \
277}
278
279#define sctp_mbuf_crush(data) do { \
280 struct mbuf *_m; \
281 _m = (data); \
282 while (_m && (SCTP_BUF_LEN(_m) == 0)) { \
283 (data) = SCTP_BUF_NEXT(_m); \
284 SCTP_BUF_NEXT(_m) = NULL; \
285 sctp_m_free(_m); \
286 _m = (data); \
287 } \
288} while (0)
289
290#define sctp_flight_size_decrease(tp1) do { \
291 if (tp1->whoTo->flight_size >= tp1->book_size) \
292 tp1->whoTo->flight_size -= tp1->book_size; \
293 else \
294 tp1->whoTo->flight_size = 0; \
295} while (0)
296
297#define sctp_flight_size_increase(tp1) do { \
298 (tp1)->whoTo->flight_size += (tp1)->book_size; \
299} while (0)
300
301#ifdef SCTP_FS_SPEC_LOG
302#define sctp_total_flight_decrease(stcb, tp1) do { \
303 if (stcb->asoc.fs_index > SCTP_FS_SPEC_LOG_SIZE) \
304 stcb->asoc.fs_index = 0;\
305 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].total_flight = stcb->asoc.total_flight; \
306 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].tsn = tp1->rec.data.tsn; \
307 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].book = tp1->book_size; \
308 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].sent = tp1->sent; \
309 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].incr = 0; \
310 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].decr = 1; \
311 stcb->asoc.fs_index++; \
312 tp1->window_probe = 0; \
313 if (stcb->asoc.total_flight >= tp1->book_size) { \
314 stcb->asoc.total_flight -= tp1->book_size; \
315 if (stcb->asoc.total_flight_count > 0) \
316 stcb->asoc.total_flight_count--; \
317 } else { \
318 stcb->asoc.total_flight = 0; \
319 stcb->asoc.total_flight_count = 0; \
320 } \
321} while (0)
322
323#define sctp_total_flight_increase(stcb, tp1) do { \
324 if (stcb->asoc.fs_index > SCTP_FS_SPEC_LOG_SIZE) \
325 stcb->asoc.fs_index = 0;\
326 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].total_flight = stcb->asoc.total_flight; \
327 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].tsn = tp1->rec.data.tsn; \
328 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].book = tp1->book_size; \
329 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].sent = tp1->sent; \
330 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].incr = 1; \
331 stcb->asoc.fslog[stcb->asoc.fs_index].decr = 0; \
332 stcb->asoc.fs_index++; \
333 (stcb)->asoc.total_flight_count++; \
334 (stcb)->asoc.total_flight += (tp1)->book_size; \
335} while (0)
336
337#else
338
339#define sctp_total_flight_decrease(stcb, tp1) do { \
340 tp1->window_probe = 0; \
341 if (stcb->asoc.total_flight >= tp1->book_size) { \
342 stcb->asoc.total_flight -= tp1->book_size; \
343 if (stcb->asoc.total_flight_count > 0) \
344 stcb->asoc.total_flight_count--; \
345 } else { \
346 stcb->asoc.total_flight = 0; \
347 stcb->asoc.total_flight_count = 0; \
348 } \
349} while (0)
350
351#define sctp_total_flight_increase(stcb, tp1) do { \
352 (stcb)->asoc.total_flight_count++; \
353 (stcb)->asoc.total_flight += (tp1)->book_size; \
354} while (0)
355
356#endif

358#define SCTP_PF_ENABLED(_net) (_net->pf_threshold < _net->failure_threshold)
359#define SCTP_NET_IS_PF(_net) (_net->pf_threshold < _net->error_count)
